DOC.detailed_description: Rapid sequence induction ( RSI ) common part routine anesthesiology practice.However several step RSI base evidence base data ( EBM ) consider controversial . In electronic evaluation form send Czech society anesthesiology , resuscitation intensive care ( ČSARIM ) member , investigator bring 4 clinical scenario RSI use . In questionnaire participant choose RSI describe next step anesthesia induction process single clinical scenario . - 1st . scenario - adult patient acute abdomen OR anesthetize - 2nd . scenario - 4 year old child acute abdomen OR schedule acute surgery - 3rd . scenario - pregnant woman schedule elective caesarean section OR - 4th . scenario - geriatric patient hiatal hernia schedule elective laparoscopic cholecystectomy .
